title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.178 - Limited-life asset
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.178 - Limited-life asset

State Regulations

Any capital asset, as a building, machine or patent, the
usefulness of which to its owner is restricted by its physical life or by the
period during which it contributes to operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.178

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
